"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Hom nyim dɛ nkan no a hom yɛ abosonsɔrfo no
enuanom: hom maa wogyaa hom kɔr abosom mmum nkyɛn."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Dɛm ntsi merema hom ehu dɛ obiara a ɔnam Nyankopɔn Sunsum mu kasa no
enuanom: ɔmmfrɛ Jesus ebusudze; na obiara nntum nnka dɛ Jesus nye Ewuradze gyedɛ ɔnam Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na adom akyɛdze horow wɔ hɔ
enuanom: na Sunsum kor no ara a."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na ɔsom horow wɔ hɔ
enuanom: na Ewuradze kor no ara a."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na dwumadzi horow wɔ hɔ
enuanom: na Nyankopɔn kor no ara na ɔyɛ adze nyina wɔ hɔn nyina mu."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Naaso wɔdze Sunsum edziyi no ma hɔn nyina nkorkor
enuanom: na aayɛ hɔn mfaso."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na wɔnam Sunsum mu ama obi enyansasɛm
enuanom: obi so nyimdzeesɛm
memmpɛ dɛ biribiara bosuma hom.": dɛ mbrɛ Sunsum kor no ara tse:"

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "obi so gyedzi
enuanom: wɔ Sunsum kor no ara mu; obi so yarsa akyɛdze wɔ Sunsum kor no ara mu;"

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "obi so etumdzeyɛ; obi so nkɔnhyɛ; obi so esunsum mu nhumu; obi so kasa horow; obi so kasa horow nkyerɛasee:"
"na yinom nyina Sunsum kor no ara na ɔyɛ
enuanom: na ɔkyekyɛ ma hɔn nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na dɛ mbrɛ nyimpadua yɛ kor
enuanom: na ɔwɔ mfafakuwa pii
memmpɛ dɛ biribiara bosuma hom.": na nyimpadua ne mfafakuwa no nyina dɔɔ so dze
column6: mbrɛ Kraest so tse nye no."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na hɛn nyina so
enuanom: Jewfo o
column7: woenuma hɛn Sunsum kor mu aba nyimpadua kor mu; na wɔama hɛn nyina anom Sunsum kor no ara bi."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na nyimpadua nnyɛ fafakuwa kor
enuanom: na pii."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Sɛ anan se dɛ
enuanom: Mennyɛ nsa ntsi mennyɛ nyimpadua ho bi a
memmpɛ dɛ biribiara bosuma hom.": nna nnyɛ iyi ntsi na ɔma ɔnnyɛ nyimpadua ho bi."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na sɛ aso se dɛ
enuanom: Mennyɛ enyiwa ntsi mennyɛ nyimpadua ho bi a
memmpɛ dɛ biribiara bosuma hom.": nna nnyɛ yi ntsi na ɔma ɔnnyɛ nyimpadua ho bi."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na sɛ nyimpadua nyina yɛ enyiwa a
enuanom: ɔtse no wɔ hen? Ne nyina yɛ ɔtse a

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na afei Nyankopɔn dze mfafakuwa esisi nyimpa ho nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ ɔpɛ."
"Na sɛ hɔn nyina yɛ fafakuwa kor a
enuanom: nyimpadua no wɔ hen?"

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na afei mfafakuwa dɔɔ so dze
enuanom: naaso nyimpadua no yɛ kor."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na enyiwa nntum nnse nsa dɛ
enuanom: Minnyi wo ho hia; anaaso bio

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na mbom nyimpadua ho mfafakuwa a wɔyɛ dɛ wɔyɛ mberɛw dodow no hɔn na hɔn ho hia;"
"na nyimpadua ho bi a yɛdwen dɛ ɔnnsɛ enyidzi pii no na yɛhyɛ no enyidzi pii; na dza ɔnnyɛ fɛw wɔ hɛn ho no na ɔwɔ ahomka pii;"
"na dza ɔyɛ fɛw wɔ hɛn ho no nnhia dɛm: na Nyankopɔn dze nyimpadua no atoatoa mu
enuanom: na mfafakuwa a wɔka bi no ɔama hɔn enyidzi pii;"

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "amma mpaapaamu aammba nyimpadua no mu
enuanom: na mbom mfafakuwa no eenya ndwendwenho kor no ara ama hɔnho nkorkor."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na sɛ fafakuwa kor hu amandze a
enuanom: mfafakuwa no nyina hu bi; na eso wɔhyɛ fafakuwa kor enyimnyam a
memmpɛ dɛ biribiara bosuma hom.": mfafakuwa no nyina nye no dzi dɛw."

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Na afei hom yɛ Kraest nyimpadua no nye no ho mfafakuwa nkorkor."
"Na Nyankopɔn dze binom esisi asɔr no mu: dza odzi kan asomafo
enuanom: otsia ebien nkɔnhyɛfo

"Na dza ɔfa no sunsum mu nsɛm ho no dz: "Ana hɔn nyina yɛ asomafo? Hɔn nyina yɛ nkɔnhyɛfo? Hɔn nyina yɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo? Hɔn nyina yɛ etumdzeyɛfo?"
"Hɔn nyina wɔ yarsa akyɛdze? Hɔn nyina kasa kasa horow? Hɔn nyina kyerɛ ase?"
"Mbom hom mper akyɛdze tsitsir no ho
enuanom: na afei merekyerɛ hom kwan a oye kyɛn biribiara."
